import {useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {fetchEmployees} from '../../redux/actions/employeeAct' function DepartmentDetail() { const { departmentId } = useParams(); const listEmployee = useSelector(state => state.employees.list).filter(item => item.department == departmentId ) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchEmployees()) },[]) console.log(listEmployee) return (
